long_description: Stretchy and stylish, the prAna Omega jacket keeps you feeling mellow after yoga. Nylon, polyester and spandex fabric wicks moisture away from your skin and protects it from harmful sunlight with a UPF rating of 50+. Stash small items in the welded, zippered chest pocket; also features zip hand pockets. Hem features a side cordlock adjustment. 4-way stretch gives the prAna Omega jacket a comfortable fit.
short_description: Stretchy and stylish, the prAna Omega jacket keeps you feeling mellow after yoga.
